txt.en: Oh no! You have to stash the present somewhere, and fast!
Just in time!
'I haven't seen Berilac in Yondershire yet, but he is probably snoozing in the sun somewhere!'
'Do not get me started on Fosco's love of boating!'
'My siblings are always off doing something, no matter what!'
DNT - Blah!
'My siblings are always off doing something, no matter what!'
Someone is drawing near to your room. You'd better hide behind the table!
Dinodas needs to keep quiet!
'I would be too, I suppose. I do love to take care of animals.'
Someone is drawing near to your room. You'd better hide behind the table!
'Now that I've had my say, perhaps I am not so different from them after all, [placeholder].'
'Maybe it is a Boffin trait!'
You must wait until it is safe to move without being observed.
<rgb=#00FF00>Cheer</rgb> in order to keep Angelica from finding Dinodas
'What was that?'
Dinodas believes the present is currently being kept in the back room at the end of the entrance hall.
Talk to Angelica Boffin
'That seems a little unnecessary, [placeholder].'
In order to prevent a good deal of embarrassment, Dinodas has enlisted your help conducting a caper by which he hopes to recover the house-warming present before his sister Angelica opens it.
With the present safely in your possession, you must now escape from 8 Honeymead Lane.
'Thank you for helping me work this out, [placeholder].'
You have to stash the present somewhere before you are found with it!
Angelica is looking for you.
Someone's coming! You'd better hide behind the table!
Angelica wants to talk to you.
'I just had to realize that this would not be a real party without my brothers and sisters.'
'Come with me to the sitting room, [placeholder]. I want to talk to you.'
'I do love them... warts and all!'
Prisca wants to talk to you.
Now is your chance!

'Oh, I don't know. It seems like such a shame to celebrate without Angelica's brothers and sisters all here! What do you think, [placeholder]?'

You tell Prisca that a true house-warming party should have as many people on hand as possible, and the real shame would be to begin the party without all of Angelica's siblings present for the celebration. She considers your argument.

'Perhaps, perhaps...'
Angelica has more to say to you.
Got it!
'I hear you, [placeholder], I really do. But you don't understand HOW OFTEN this happens! My brothers and sisters are always running off at the most inopportune times.'
Angelica has more to say to you.
Quick! You must think of something to mask Dinodas's sounds of celebration!
Stash the present somewhere... and fast!
Dinodas has made it out of 8 Honeymead Lane with the wrapped present!
'Don't trouble yourself, Prisca.'
'I just needed to talk it out, I think. I will wait until my brothers and sisters have all returned.\n\n'And then we will have my party.'
'Why not save the food for the party?'
Hear what Angelica has to say
Talk to Angelica Boffin
Talk to Prisca Boffin
Talk to Angelica Boffin
Listen to Angelica and keep her from discovering any mischief!
'And Dinodas! He's always causing trouble!'
Dinodas believes the present is currently being kept in the back room at the end of the entrance hall.
'I will wait for my party... but it had better be a good one!'
'But how can there be a party?'
'I am going to talk to [placeholder]!'
'There you are.'
'Listen, Angelica, I will bring some food from the kitchen to cheer you up.'
'I have been thinking.'
'It will be no trouble at all.'
'What if we have the party anyway... right this very minute?'
'Oh, poor darling...'
'What do you think, Mother?'
'But if my daughter wants her party now, she shall have it!'
'Griffo is always looking for food to eat.'
'Marigold is always on the hunt for adventure.'
'If Esmeralda isn't dancing, she's searching for an excuse to start!'
The caper is concluded!
Find the wrapped present in the west storage room
Hide behind the table before you are seen!
<rgb=#00FF00>Faint</rgb> or <rgb=#00FF00>lie down</rgb> to hide from view
Wait for Prisca to return to the sitting room
One caper, well-executed... more or less.
Find the wrapped present in the west storage room
Escape from 8 Honeymead Lane
Follow Angelica to the sitting room
Instance: A Caper On Honeymead Lane
